Class GazeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.theeyetribe.clientsdk.utils.GazeUtils

  • public class GazeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods common to working with gaze estimation.

                                      int dimHeight)

      • clampGazeToRect

        public static Point2D clampGazeToRect(Point2D gaze,
                                      int dimX,
                                      int dimY,
                                      int dimWidth,
                                      int dimHeight)
        Clamps a gaze points within the limits of the parameter rect.
        Parameters:
        gaze - point to clamp
        dimX - x coordinate of topleft rect anchor
        dimY - y coordinate of topleft rect anchor
        dimWidth - width of the rect
        dimHeight - height of the rect
        Returns:
        clamped gaze point

      • clampGazeToRect

        public static Point2D clampGazeToRect(Point2D gaze,
                                      int dimWidth,
                                      int dimHeight,
                                      float clampMargin)
        Clamps a gaze points within the limits of the parameter rect and taking into account the desired vertical and horizontal margins.

        If the gaze point is within the margin, it will be clamped inside the rect.

        Parameters:
        gaze - point to clamp
        dimWidth - width of the rect
        dimHeight - height of the rect
        clampMargin - clamping margin
        Returns:
        clamped gaze point

      • clampGazeToRect

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable Point2D clampGazeToRect(Point2D gaze,
                                                           int dimX,
                                                           int dimY,
                                                           int dimWidth,
                                                           int dimHeight,
                                                           float clampHorsMargin,
                                                           float clampVertMargin)
        Clamps a gaze points within the limits of the parameter rect and taking into account the desired vertical and horizontal margins.

        If the gaze point is within the margin, it will be clamped inside the rect.

        Parameters:
        gaze - point to clamp
        dimX - x coordinate of topleft rect anchor
        dimY - y coordinate of topleft rect anchor
        dimWidth - width of the rect
        dimHeight - height of the rect
        clampHorsMargin - horizontal clamping margin
        clampVertMargin - vertical clamping margin
        Returns:
        clamped gaze point

        a 2d point in relative values

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable Point2D getNormalizedMapping(Point2D point,
                                                                int dimWidth,
                                                                int dimHeight)
        Maps eye position of gaze coords in pixels within normalized space [x: -1:1 , y: -1:1]
        Parameters:
        point - in pixels
        dimWidth - width of area to map relative coordinates to
        dimHeight - height of area to map relative coordinates to
        Returns:
